presentation.preview: My name is Carlos Neto, I'm a Full-Stack Junior Software Developer mainly working with C# and React. I also play the guitar and paint some frames as a hobby. Down below I have a timeline with my current experience.

dgav.candidaturas: Platform developed with Blazor App, .NET 8.0, SQL Server and Git for version control and development to automate a manual process made by hand with forms.
dgav.jurista-mobile: Application developed for law workspace for DGAV, with the goal to automate a process state update and its validation, developed using React Native and Git for version control.

ninja.description: At my last year in high school I did an internship by Erasmus, a european program that gives really good opportunities to students. I went to Berlim, Germany and work for a company called NinjaRMM, by the end of my internship it changed to NinjaOne. I worked for the marketing team collecting emails and phone numbers with webscrape and APIs. They needed a programmer because they had about 15 thousand leads to collect, which can not be done one by one. In the marketing workspace, they did not know much about programming so I had to choose the best way to solve their problem on my own.
activities: Creation of a email signature generator with HTML, CSS, JS
Collecting leads data with APIs using Python

listo.description: Listo S.A is a brazilian company that works with payment machines, I did not work for the development team that work on the SaaS, I was in the infrastructure team helping with the equipment invetory, computer problems and configuration.
